name: Baldur's Gate 3 Name Generator
description: Roll for initiative and discover the perfect moniker for your adventurer in Faerûn! Whether you're a cunning rogue, a devout cleric, or a mighty barbarian, this generator will craft a name worthy of the Forgotten Realms.
introduction: Tired of staring blankly at the character creation screen? Let the Baldur's Gate 3 Name Generator banish your naming woes! We've delved into the lore and languages of the Forgotten Realms to bring you a treasure trove of names, perfect for any race and class combination. Prepare to embark on your epic quest with a name that resonates with power and adventure!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold! A brand new name, forged in the fires of Mount Hotenow, will appear before your very eyes.
Feeling picky? Keep clicking! We've got enough names to populate the entire Sword Coast.
Customize your results by selecting specific races or classes (coming soon!).
Found a name you love? Copy and paste it into Baldur's Gate 3 and prepare to conquer!
Pro Tip: Whisper your generated name dramatically in a darkened room for maximum immersion. (Disclaimer: May attract unwanted attention from your pets.)

faqs.question: Is this generator officially endorsed by Larian Studios?
faqs.answer: While we're HUGE fans of Baldur's Gate 3, this generator is a fan-made creation. We're not affiliated with Larian Studios, but we hope they think it's pretty cool!

faqs.question: Will this generator work for all races and classes in Baldur's Gate 3?
faqs.answer: We've tried to create names suitable for a wide range of characters, but some names might feel more appropriate for certain races or classes. We're constantly updating the generator to improve its versatility!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Dungeons & Dragons characters?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! These names are perfect for any character in the Forgotten Realms, whether you're playing Baldur's Gate 3 or a tabletop D&D campaign.

faqs.question: Are the names generated completely random?
faqs.answer: While the names are generated using a random algorithm, we've carefully curated the prefixes and suffixes to ensure they sound authentic and evocative of the Baldur's Gate universe. There's a method to the madness!

faqs.question: I found a name I love, but it's already taken! What should I do?
faqs.answer: Oh no! That's the risk of exploring the vast realms of character creation. Try adding a title or epithet to the name, like 'Aella the Swift' or 'Grom the Grim'. Or, generate another name – adventure awaits!

faqs.question: Will you be adding more features to this generator?
faqs.answer: You bet! We're always looking for ways to improve the generator and add new features, such as race and class-specific name options. Stay tuned for updates!
